Bootstrap prerequisites test results in XML
Selected tests in XML

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:getScaleDenominators
ctl:function.ctl:param: comma separated list of tile matrix set names
ctl:function.ctl:return: comma separated list of scale denominators for the TileMatrices in the TileMatrixSet with the specified name.
ctl:function.ctl:description: Gets the tile matrix scale denominators for a tile matrix set.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:checkCRSforWellKnownScaleSet
ctl:function.ctl:description: Checks whether or not wellKnownScaleSet matches supportedCRS as defined in table in WMTS specification.Annex E.

ctl:message.select: concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is not the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet, ' - supported CRS is ', $crs84)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is not the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet, ' - supported CRS is ', $crs84)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is not the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet, ' - supported CRS is ', $crs84)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet)
concat('TileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' CRS ', $supportedCRS, ' is not the supported CRS for Well Known Scale Set ', $wellKnownScaleSet, ' - supported CRS is ', $epsg6)

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:scaleDenominatorsForWellKnownScaleSet
ctl:function.ctl:param: URN of well known scale set
ctl:function.ctl:return: comma separated list of scale denominators
ctl:function.ctl:description: Provides scale denominators for wellKnownScaleSets defined in table in WMTS specification.Annex E.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:checkScaleDenominatorsAgainstWellKnownScaleSet
ctl:function.ctl:param: URN of well known scale set
comma separated list of Tile Matrix scale denominators to check
ctl:function.ctl:description: Compares scaleDenominators against those of specified wellKnownScaleSet

ctl:message.select: concat('No scale denominators are available for well known scale set ', $wellKnownScaleSet, ' which is unknown.')
concat('More scale denominators (', $numSorted, ') from tile matrix set to test than are defined (', $numWK, ') for well known scale set ', $wellKnownScaleSet)
concat('Scale Denominator ', $sd, ' in position ', $pos, ' sorted descending does not match corresponding value ', $wk, ' for well known scale set ', $wellKnownScaleSet)

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:sequenceDimensionsValues
ctl:function.ctl:param: wmts:Layer element from bootstrap capabilities document with one or more wmts:Dimension elements
comma separated list of initially all, subsequently remaining dimension names in layer
initially empty, subsequently a # separated list of * separated lists of dimension, value, e.g. d1,v1*d2,v1*d3,v1#d1,v1*d2,v1*d3,v2# ...
ctl:function.ctl:return: a # separated list of * separated lists of dimension, value, e.g. d1,v1*d2,v1*d3,v1#d1,v1*d2,v1*d3,v2# ...
ctl:function.ctl:description: Recursive function to convert wmts:Layer/wmts:Dimension/wmts:Value elements into token separated list of lists of lists containing combinations of dimensions and values.

url | file | resource

ctl:function.ctl:param: capabilitiesURL without trailing ?
full path to wmts.xsd
url | file | resource

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:RESTful.GetCapabilities.Request.Mandatory
ctl:function.ctl:param: capabilitiesURL without trailing ?
full path to wmts.xsd
url | file | resource

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:check.GetCapabilities.Request.Mandatory
ctl:function.ctl:param: capabilities response from XMLValidatingParser
ctl:function.ctl:description: >Check GetCapabilites request with mandatory parameters response, that it is valid and contains all sections.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity; should have been a WMTS Capabilities document.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Response entity is a valid WMTS Capabilities document

xsl:when.ctl:message: Capabilities document root element is wmts:Capabilities.
Capabilities Document contains required ows:ServiceIdentification element.
Capabilities Document contains required ows:ServiceProvider element.
Capabilities Document contains required ows:OperationsMetadata element.
Capabilities Document contains required wmts:Contents element.
Capabilities Document contains all required sections

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Capabilities Document is missing required wmts:Contents element.
Capabilities Document is missing required ows:OperationsMetadata element.
Capabilities Document is missing required ows:ServiceProvider element.
CapabilitiesDocument is missing required ows:ServiceIdentification element.
Capabilities document root element is not wmts:Capabilities.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:KVP.GetCapabilities.Response.Layer.Identifiers.Unique
ctl:function.ctl:param: get|post
OWS service type, e.g. WMTS
ctl:function.ctl:description: Verify that the WMTS Layers advertised in the Service Metadata document have different non empty identifiers.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:XML.GetCapabilities.Response.Layer.Identifiers.Unique
ctl:function.ctl:param: OWS service type, e.g. WMTS
ctl:function.ctl:description: Verify that the WMTS Layers advertised in the Service Metadata document have different non empty identifiers.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:SOAP.GetCapabilities.Response.Layer.Identifiers.Unique
ctl:function.ctl:param: OWS service type, e.g. WMTS
ctl:function.ctl:description: Verify that the WMTS Layers advertised in the Service Metadata document have different non empty identifiers.

xsl:when.ctl:message: There are no blank layer identifiers in the response.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Some layer identifier in the response is blank.

xsl:when.ctl:message: There are no identified layers in the response.

ctl:message.select: concat('There are ', $numLayersIdentifiers, ' identified layers in the response.')
concat('There are ', $numDistinctLayersIdentifiers, ' different layer identifiers in the response, so all the identified layers have different identifiers')
concat('There are ', $numDistinctLayersIdentifiers, ' different layer identifiers in the response, so some identified layers have the same identifiers')

xsl:when.ctl:message: Test failed.

ctl:function.ctl:description: Verify that the metadata for each of the LegendURL resources is correct.

xsl:when.ctl:message: Test skipped: There are no wmts:LegendURL elements in the response, so the capabiltiy is considered to be not implemented.

ctl:message.select: concat('Checking LegendURL resources for layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' minScaleDenominator ', $minScaleDenominator, ' maxScaleDenominator ', $maxScaleDenominator)
concat('Format ', $format, ' is not an image format ')
concat('Blank or invalid Image URI ', $imageURI)
concat('Actual image format ', $imageFormat, ' does not match LegendURL format ', $format)
concat('MinScaleDenominator not found in scale Denominators for tile matrix sets ', $tileMatrixSetNames, ' for layer')
concat('MaxScaleDenominator not found in scale Denominators for tile matrix sets ', $tileMatrixSetNames, ' for layer')
concat('Actual image width ', $imageWidth, ' does not match LegendURL width ', $width, ' for layer')
concat('Actual image height ', $imageHeight, ' does not match LegendURL height ', $height, ' for layer')

xsl:when.ctl:message: Test failed.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Test passed: LegendURL resources are correct.

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:KVP.GetTile.Mandatory
ctl:function.ctl:param: /wmts:Capabilities/ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetTile']/ows:DCP/ows:HTTP/ows:Get/@xlink:href
version returned in the bootstrap capabilities document, expected to be 1.0.0
Capabilities document from test suite bootstrap.
get|post
ctl:function.ctl:description: Test that a WMTS server can return tiles advertised in its Service Metadata document in response to valid KVP GET GetTile requests with valid values for mandatory parameters as specified in the Service Metadata document.

ctl:message.select: concat('Issuing KVP ', upper-case($method), ' GetTile requests to ', $serviceURL, ' for the following:')

concat('layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' format ', $format, ' tileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' has limits ', boolean($tileMatrixSetLimits), ' tileMatrix ', $tileMatrixId, ' row ', $row, ' col ', $col)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Error: Could not read the image format.

ctl:message.select: concat('response imageFormat ', $imageFormat, ' width ', $width, ' height ', $height, ' HTTP status code ', $code)

xsl:if.ctl:message: Error: Could not read the image size.

ctl:message.select: concat('Test failed. Server.KVP.', upper-case($method), '.GetTile.Mandatory')
concat('Test passed: Server.KVP.', upper-case($method), '.GetTile.Mandatory')

concat('layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' format ', $format, ' tileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' has limits ', boolean($tileMatrixSetLimits), ' tileMatrix ', $tileMatrixId, ' row ', $row, ' col ', $col, $dimensionsMessage)

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:KVP.GetTile.Valid.Tile.Transparency
ctl:function.ctl:param: /wmts:Capabilities/ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetTile']/ows:DCP/ows:HTTP/ows:Get/@xlink:href
version returned in the bootstrap capabilities document, expected to be 1.0.0
Capabilities document from test suite bootstrap.
get|post
ctl:function.ctl:description: Server must have TransparentNodata Layer and TileMatrixSet and serve nodataSquare.png tile to support this test. Verify that the returned nodataSquare.png tile has transparent color for NODATA values.

ctl:message.select: concat('Issuing GetTile requests to ', $serviceURL, ' for the following:')
concat('layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' format ', $format, ' tileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' tileMatrix ', $tileMatrixId, ' row ', $row, ' col ', $col)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Error: Could not read the image type.

ctl:message.select: concat('response image transparency: ', $transparency, ' transparent nodata (black) pixels: ', $transparentNodata, ' imageFormat ', $imageFormat, ' width ', $width, ' height ', $height, ' HTTP status code ', $code)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Error: Could not read the image size.
Error: Could not read the image transparency.
Error: Could not read the image transparent nodata (black).

ctl:message.select: concat('Failure: ', $transparency, ' means all pixels have an alpha value of 1.0')
concat('Failure: ', $transparency, ' transparency assumed to be completely Opaque, i.e.t all pixels have an alpha value of 1.0')

concat('Success: transparentNodata with transparency ', $transparency, ' represents image data that on a per-pixel basis is either completely opaque, with an alpha value of 1.0, or completely transparent, with an alpha value of 0.0, and all nodata (black) pixels are transparent.')

concat('Success: transparentNodata with transparency ', $transparency, ' represents image data that on a per-pixel basis has arbitrary alpha values between and including 0.0 (transparent) and 1.0 (opaque).and all nodata (black) pixels are transparent.')

xsl:choose.xsl:when: Indeterminate: there were not any nodata (black) pixels in the image.I

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Failure: nodata (black) pixels in the image are not transparent.

ctl:message.select: concat('Test passed: Server.KVP.', upper-case($method), '.GetTile.Valid.Tile.Transparency')
concat('Test failed. Server.KVP.', upper-case($method), '.GetTile.Valid.Tile.Transparency')

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:XML.GetTile.Valid.Tile.Transparency
ctl:function.ctl:param: /wmts:Capabilities/ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetTile']/ows:DCP/ows:HTTP/ows:Get/@xlink:href
version returned in the bootstrap capabilities document, expected to be 1.0.0
Capabilities document from test suite bootstrap.
ctl:function.ctl:description: Verify that the returned tile has transparent color for NODATA values.

ctl:message.select: concat('Issuing GetTile requests to ', $serviceURL, ' for the following:')
concat('layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' format ', $format, ' tileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' tileMatrix ', $tileMatrixId, ' row ', $row, ' col ', $col)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Error: Could not read the image type.

ctl:message.select: concat('response image transparency: ', $transparency, ' transparent nodata (black) pixels: ', $transparentNodata, ' imageFormat ', $imageFormat, ' width ', $width, ' height ', $height, ' HTTP status code ', $code)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Error: Could not read the image size.
Error: Could not read the image transparency.
Error: Could not read the image transparent nodata (black).

ctl:function.ctl:description: Test that a WMTS server can return FeatureInfo for pixels in tiles in response to valid KVP GetFeatureInfo requests with optional sample dimensions parameter with the "default" values specified in the Service Metadata document.

ctl:code.ctl:message: Issuing RESTful GetTile requests for the following:

ctl:message.select: concat('layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' format ', $format, ' tileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' has limits ', boolean($tileMatrixSetLimits), ' tileMatrix ', $tileMatrixId, ' row ', $row, ' col ', $col, ' j ', $j, ' i ', $i, ' dimension ', $dimensionId, ' value ', $value, $dimensionsMessage)
concat('restURL: ', $restURL)
concat('FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity ; should have been Feature Info in format ', $infoFormat)
concat('Response entity contentType ', $contentType, ' considered to match infoFormat ', $infoFormat)
concat('Failure: Response entity contentType ', $contentType, ' not considered to match infoFormat ', $infoFormat)
concat('HTTP status code ', $code)
concat('FAILURE: invalid template ', $resourceURLtemplate, ' for layer ', $layer/ows:Identifier, ' format ', $format)
concat('FAILURE:no resourceURLtemplate found for layer ', $layer/ows:Identifier, ' format ', $format)

xsl:when.ctl:message: Test failed. Server.RESTful.GetFeatureInfo.Default.SampleDimension

concat('FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity ; should have been Feature Info in format ', $infoFormat)

concat('Failure: Response entity contentType ', $contentType, ' not considered to match infoFormat ', $infoFormat)

get|post

concat('layer ', $layerId, ' style ', $styleId, ' format ', $format, ' infoFormat ', $infoFormat, ' tileMatrixSet ', $tileMatrixSetId, ' has limits ', boolean($tileMatrixSetLimits), ' tileMatrix ', $tileMatrixId, ' row ', $row, ' col ', $col, ' j ', $j, ' i ', $i, $dimensionsMessage)

concat('Test passed: Server.KVP.', upper-case($method), '.GetFeatureInfo.NonQueryable.Layer')

ctl:function.name: wmtsFunctions:getResourceURLforLayer
ctl:function.ctl:param: wmts:Layer element from bootstrap Capabilities document
format for tile or infoFormat for FeatureInfo
tile|FeatureInfo
ctl:function.ctl:description: Returns wmts:ResourceURL/@template value for specified layer, format, and resourceType, if there is one and only one, else returns nothing
